statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 4 , 9 \, x^{3} + 14 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x - 12 , -3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 4 , -3 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 4 , -9 \, x^{3} - 14 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 12\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
